prompts: Create a rock-type Pokemon featuring sharp red crystals and a sturdy body.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a rocky creature, with vibrant colors and a unique shape.
Generate a Pokemon inspired by mountains, showcasing a blend of blue and red tones.
Make a Pokemon that has a powerful presence, with jagged features and a solid build.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies strength and resilience, with striking colors and a rugged appearance.
Design a Pokemon with a rocky exterior and bright accents, perfect for mountainous terrains.
Show me a Pokemon that looks like a boulder come to life, adorned with vibrant spikes.
